segments.text: I notice the water is just gushing out of the sink, creating a huge puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing right there, but she's completely unaware of the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, trying to get those cookies without getting caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit disgusted watching the boy risk his safety for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just as guilty, encouraging him to take those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman should really pay more attention to what's going on around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the water is already spreading across the floor, causing a hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, it's like he's defying gravity to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they'll get away with it or if the woman will catch them in the act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is a mix of disgust and amusement, watching the children's antics and the woman's obliviousness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and puts a stop to this nonsense.
segments.speaker: PAR
